testcase.name: Verify period filter layout (Monthly, Weekly or Daily)
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if layout changes according to the period selected.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: The current month is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and year

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Weekly"
step.expectedresults: The current week is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and number of week

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Daily"
step.expectedresults: The current day is displayed on calendar and its title has the format week day, day/month

step.actions: Check if all the results found are consistent with the results expected
step.expectedresults: All the results are consistent

testcase.name: Verify status filter (Active, Canceled, Paused and Unknow)
testcase.summary: This test shall verify the correct functioning of the selection status filter.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign in each status: Active, Canceled, Paused and Unknow

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown status field select "Active"
step.expectedresults: All and only Active campaigns are shown on calendar, and the color matches the color of legend

step.actions: On dropdown status field select "Canceled"
step.expectedresults: All and only Canceled campaigns are shown on calendar, and the color matches the color of legend

step.actions: On dropdown status field select "Paused"
step.expectedresults: All and only Paused campaigns are shown on calendar, and the color matches the color of legend

step.actions: On dropdown status field select "Unknow"
step.expectedresults: All and only Unknow campaigns are shown on calendar, and the color matches the color of legend

testcase.name: Verify period filter (Monthly, Weekly or Daily)
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the campaigns are correctly filtred according to the selected period.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign in each status: Active, Canceled, Paused and Unknow

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: Check if all and only the campaings of current month are displayed on calendar

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Weekly"
step.expectedresults: Check if all and only the campaings of current week are displayed on calendar

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Daily"
step.expectedresults: Check if all and only the campaings of current day are displayed on calendar

step.actions: Check if all the results found are consistent with the results expected
step.expectedresults: All the results are consistent

testcase.name: Correct sequence of the Months
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system correctly displays every months of the year on the correct sequence.
testcase.preconditions: Log in

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: The current month is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and year

step.actions: At the title of calendar, click on right arrow ">" to pass to the next month, until it reaches December
step.expectedresults: The ascending sequence of months is correct

step.actions: At the title of calendar, click on left arrow "<" to pass to the previous month, until it reaches January
step.expectedresults: The descending sequence of months is correct

testcase.name: Correct sequence of the Weeks
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system correctly displays every weeks of the month on the correct sequence
testcase.preconditions: Log in

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Weekly"
step.expectedresults: The current week is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and number of week

step.actions: At the title of calendar, click on right arrow ">" to pass to the next week, until it reaches the end of the month
step.expectedresults: The ascending sequence of weeks is correct

step.actions: At the title of calendar, click on left arrow "<" to pass to the previous week, until it reaches the begging of the month
step.expectedresults: The descending sequence of weeks is correct

testcase.name: Correct sequence of the Days
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system correctly displays every days of the weeks on the correct sequence.
testcase.preconditions: Log in

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Daily"
step.expectedresults: The current day is displayed on calendar and its title has the format week day, day/month

step.actions: At the title of calendar, click on right arrow ">" to pass to the next day, until it reaches the end of the month
step.expectedresults: The ascending sequence of days is correct

step.actions: At the title of calendar, click on left arrow "<" to pass to the previous day, until it reaches the begging of the month
step.expectedresults: The descending sequence of days is correct

testcase.name: Campaign progress by period at month mode
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system correctly informs campaigns progress by indicating bar on calendar.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: The current month is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and year

step.actions: Check if the progress of the campaign is correctly indicated in its proposed period
step.expectedresults: System correctly displays the progress of the campaign in its proposed period

testcase.name: Campaign progress by period at weekly mode
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system correctly informs campaigns progress by indicating bar on calendar.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign of current week in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Weekly"
step.expectedresults: The current week is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and number of week

step.actions: Check if the progress of the campaign is correctly indicated in its proposed period
step.expectedresults: System correctly displays the progress of the campaign in its proposed period

testcase.name: Campaign progress by period at daily mode
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if system correctly informs campaigns progress by indicating bar on calendar.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign of current day in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Daily"
step.expectedresults: The current day is displayed on calendar and its title has the format week day, day/month

step.actions: Check if the progress of the campaign is correctly indicated in its proposed period
step.expectedresults: System correctly displays the progress of the campaign in its proposed period

testcase.name: Verify correct name of the campaigns on legend at monthly mode
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the system correctly displays the name of the registered campaigns during the study period on legend (the message that appears when mouse is rested over progress bar)
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign of current month in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: The current month is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and year

step.actions: Rest the mouse over the line that indicates the progress of the campaign
step.expectedresults: The lengend appears

step.actions: Verify is campaign name on legend is correct
step.expectedresults: System displays the correct name of the campaigns selected

step.actions: Rest the mouse over the line that indicates the progress of the campaign
step.expectedresults: The lengend appears

step.actions: Verify is campaign name on legend is correct
step.expectedresults: System displays the correct name of the campaigns selected

testcase.name: Verify correct name of the campaigns on legend at daily mode
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the system correctly displays the name of the registered campaigns during the study period on legend (the message that appears when mouse is rested over progress bar)
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign of current day in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu

step.expectedresults: System displays the correct name of the campaigns selected

testcase.name: Verify "See all" link with campaigns created at monthly mode
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if  "See all" link displays all the campaigns of the respective day
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign of current week in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: The current month is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and year

step.actions: Click at any "See all" link (choose any day with campaign)
step.expectedresults: The screen with all the campaigns for the day choosen is displayed

step.actions: Check if the day of the opened screen is correct and if all the campaings are displayed
step.expectedresults: The day on the screen is correct and all the campaigns for this day are displayed

testcase.name: Verify "See all" link with campaigns created at weekly mode
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if  "See all" link displays all the campaigns of the respective day
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign of current week in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Weekly"
step.expectedresults: The current week is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and number of week

step.actions: Click at any "See all" link (choose any day with campaign)
step.expectedresults: The screen with all the campaigns for the day choosen is displayed

step.actions: Check if the day of the opened screen is correct and if all the campaings are displayed
step.expectedresults: The day on the screen is correct and all the campaigns for this day are displayed

testcase.name: Verify camp. prog. at screen opened through "See all" link at monthly mode [created comp.]
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if campaigns progress are correctly displayed at screen opened through "See all" link at monthly mode, when there is company created.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have at least one registered campaign of current month in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: The current month is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and year

step.actions: Click at any "See all" link (choose any day with campaign)
step.expectedresults: The screen with all the campaigns for the day choosen is displayed

step.actions: Check if the colors of progress bar of campaigns correctly correspond to the colors of legend
step.expectedresults: The colors of progress bar of campaigns and the colors of legend correctly correspond

testcase.name: Verify "See all" link with no campaigns created at monthly mode
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if  "See all" link opens screen but does not display campaigns for the respective day.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have none registered campaign for current month in the system

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: On dropdown field choose "Mensal"
step.expectedresults: The current month is displayed on calendar and its title has the format month and year

step.actions: Click at any "See all" link (choose any day)
step.expectedresults: The screen with all the campaigns for the day choosen is displayed

step.actions: Check if there are campaings displayed
step.expectedresults: There are no campaigns diplayed for this day

testcase.name: Verify if new campaign is correctly displayed on calendar
testcase.summary: This test case shall verify if a new created campaign is correctley displayed on calendar.
testcase.preconditions: Log in and create a new campaign

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Schedule Campaign" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Schedule Campaign page is displayed

step.actions: Schedule a new campaign for the current day
step.expectedresults: A new campaign is scheduled for the current day

step.actions:
Check if the new created campaign is correctly displayed on calendar:

  • It must be displayed on calendar at Monthly mode;
  • It must be displayed on calendar at Weekly mode;
  • It must be displayed on calendar at Daily mode;
  • In all cases above it It must be displayed in the correct period of durantion
step.expectedresults:
Check the results below:

  • It is correctly displayed on calendar at Monthly mode;
  • It is correctly displayed on calendar at Weekly mode;
  • It is correctly displayed on calendar at Daily mode;
  • In all cases above it is correctly displayed in the correct period of durantion

testcase.name: Verify visualization of scheduled campaign on calendar
testcase.summary: This test shall verify if the information of scheduled campaign are correctly displayed when it is clicked on calendar screen
testcase.preconditions: Log in and have a scheduled campaign

step.actions: Access Valid system with admin/regular user
step.expectedresults: The system is successfully acessed

step.actions: Access "Calendar" on menu
step.expectedresults: The Calendar page is displayed

step.actions: Click at any scheduled campaign
step.expectedresults: The screen with compaign's information is opened

step.actions:
Check if displayed information are correct:

  • The screen's title must be the campaign's name;
  • All the fields must be correctly filled.
step.expectedresults:
Check the results:

  • The screen's title is the campaign's name;
  • All the fields are correctly filled.
